bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Definition of Reliability Program Plans for Nuclear Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities
IEEE Draft Guide for the Definition of Reliability Program Plans for Nuclear Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document provides guidelines for the definition of a reliability program at nuclear generating stations and other nuclear facilities. The document emphasizes reliability programs during the operating phase of such facilities; however, the general approach applies to all phases (e.g., design, construction, start-up, operating, and decommissioning) of the facility.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
